name: @squaresapp/fila
author: Paul Gordon
description: File system layer with multiple backends for different JavaScript environments.

scripts.bundle-capacitor: tsc -p tsconfig.release.json && terser ./+build/fila.debug.js > ./+build/fila-capacitor.min.js --define CAPACITOR=true --define NODE=false --define TAURI=false --define WEB=false
scripts.bundle-node: tsc -p tsconfig.release.json && terser ./+build/fila.debug.js > ./+build/fila-node.min.js --define CAPACITOR=false --define NODE=true --define TAURI=false --define WEB=false
scripts.bundle-tauri: tsc -p tsconfig.release.json && terser ./+build/fila.debug.js > ./+build/fila-tauri.min.js --define CAPACITOR=false --define NODE=false --define TAURI=true --define WEB=false
scripts.bundle-web: tsc -p tsconfig.release.json && terser ./+build/fila.debug.js > ./+build/fila-web.min.js --define CAPACITOR=false --define NODE=false --define TAURI=false --define WEB=true
scripts.bundle-all: npm run bundle-capacitor && npm run bundle-node && npm run bundle-tauri && npm run bundle-web
scripts.release: npm run bundle-all && cd ./+build && cp ../package.json ./package.json && np && cp ./package.json ../package.json
